thread.title_full: HBO’s Westworld’s sexually explicit contract calls for extras to ‘perform genital-to-genital touching’ and nude bareback riding

title: HBO’s Westworld’s sexually explicit contract calls for extras to ‘perform genital-to-genital touching’ and nude bareback riding
text:
HBO's Westworld, starring Anthony Hopkins and Jeffrey Wright, isn't set to debut until 2016, but it's already rattling a few feathers. 
HBO has a knack for gratuitous and controversial nudity (hello, Game of Thrones!), but it looks like the network’s new drama, Westworld, “a dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the future of sin” inspired by the 1973 Michael Crichton film, is taking the cake. 
Background actors were required Tuesday to sign a nudity and sex consent form that has Screen Actors Guild (SAG-AFTRA) officials concerned that actors won’t realize that if they get uncomfortable about what they’re about to shoot, they are allowed to withdraw, according to The Hollywood Reporter .
